0.text: Innate: Diana gains  15% − 40% (based on level) bonus attack speed. After casting an ability, this bonus is tripled to 45% − 120% (based on level) for 3 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Diana gains  15% − 40% (based on level) bonus attack speed. After casting an ability, this bonus is tripled to 45% − 120% (based on level) for 3 seconds.

1.text: Innate: Diana's basic attacks generate a stack of Moonsilver Blade for 3.5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and stacking up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, Diana empowers her next basic attack to consume the stacks  on-hit to additionally cleave nearby enemies, dealing them 20 − 220 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) magic damage. Moonsilver Blade deals 300% damage against  monsters.

monsters

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supersonic: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
active.originText:
UNIQUE – SUPERSONIC:  Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage to enemies hit. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
